answers.author: Kara Batt
answers.text:
I recommend using a pre-built budgeting software solution instead of creating a whole new program to manage your facilities maintenance budget. Go for a solution that you can update in real-time, is low in cost, and easy to use. If you would like, I can direct you to some great online resources or dig up a few good articles on this subject and send those to you.  Hope this helped. Good luck!
